      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MessageClient.get(String messageId, CompletionHandler<Message> handler)
      Retrieves the details for a message by message Id.
      void MessageClient.list(String roomId, String before, String beforeMessage, String mentionedPeople, int max, CompletionHandler<List<Message>> handler)
      Lists all messages in a room by room Id.
      void MessageClient.post(String roomId, String personId, String personEmail, String text, String markdown, String[] files, CompletionHandler<Message> handler)
      Posts a plain text message, and optionally, a media content attachment, to a room by room Id.
